name: :warming muscle salve:
description:
If ever there was a product made specially for winter THIS IS IT.  We bring you relief in a jar, a deeply warming, healing, & stimulating salve for your aches and pains.

This penetrating salve contains Thai hot peppers grown from seed by my hard working farmer friends at Rare Earth Farm, then dried and infused by me.  Thai hot peppers contain capsaicin, which, when applied to the skin, excite heat sensors & stimulate circulation. In addition we've added ginger for its warming and anti-inflammatory properties, plus arnica for pain relief. 

Soothing oils & butters soften your skin while the synergistic blend of botanicals and essential oils helps temporarily relieve pain from sore muscles, arthritis, migraines, and stiff joints.  If you're like me and suffer from poor circulation(constant cold feet) this is also for you.  

Ingredients: organic sunflower oil infused with Rare Earth Farm Thai peppers|comfrey root|arnica|avocado oil| coconut oil| shea butter|beeswax|vitamin e|essential oils of ginger|wild orange|clove|patchouli|eucalyptus|lavender

To use: apply directly to affected area multiple times a day if needed.  Be sure to massage into critical areas: temples, back of neck, collar bone, "when in doubt...soles of feet."  DO NOT apply to sensitive areas, cuts or scrapes, or skin irritations.  Avoid contact with eyes and wash hands after application.

This listing is for one (1) 1.7 oz amber glass jar or 2.5 oz. based on specification.

name: :Female Support: essential oil blend
description:
Women need and deserve immediate relief.  We're all going through something, some even major life transformations others maybe discomfort from their cycle.  Whether you are menstrual, menopausal, or postpartum this blend is here to comfort you.  

Use these essentials oils which have analgesic, antispasmodic, & anti-inflammatory properties to bring you relief and even clarity.  We've blended together lavender for everything under the sun but mostly relaxation, clary sage for emotional swings & menstrual discomfort, grapefruit & wild orange for anxiety and depression, geranium & ylang ylang for hormonal balance, palmarosa for stress, and fennel for estrogen balance-hot flashes!

This blend, for all women has been conveniently packaged in a 10 ml glass roll-on tube perfect for your pocket or bag.  Makes a lovely addition to your night-stand.

All oils are exclusively handcrafted, drop-by-drop, by me using concentrated, therapeutic grade essential oils.  Please test patch for sensitivity.  For external use only.

name: :winter solstice: essential oil blend
description:
The aroma of the season has arrived.  Fill your space with a synergistic blend of spice, citrus, and fresh pine.  

We can all get a little stressed and overwhelmed during the holidays.  It is important for your well-being to step back and bring a little clarity back into your mind & home.  Maybe this warm & fresh essential blend is the answer.

There are several ways to use this nostalgic blend.  A favorite of course is through a diffuser.  Don't have one?  Just place several drops in a pot on your stove.  If you have a wood-stove, even better and we're jealous.  This blend comes mixed with a touch of jojoba so you can apply next to your skin if you'd like.  Revitalize your spirit with a couple drops in a warm drawn bath.

All oils are exclusively handcrafted, drop-by-drop, by me using concentrated therapeutic-grade essential oils.  Please test patch for sensitivity and use this oil only externally.

This listing is for one (1) 15 ml | 1/2 oz. amber glass bottle with reducer.

name: : FACIAL WASH : lavender & cedarwood
description:
A creamy, simple facial cleanser packed with nourishing oils to effectively cleanse your face without stripping, harming, or drying your skin. 

This soothing formula contains organic aloe vera, botanicals, extracts, and gentle oils of coconut, jojoba, and avocado to lock in moisture and leave your skin feeling soft & smooth and looking radiant.  Our Facial Wash is enriched with a calming synergistic blend of essential oils to repair & heal the skin.

Don't be fooled by its lightweight consistency.  It creates a beautiful lather in no time, for a perfect moisturizing facial wash.  This cleanser is beneficial for mature, dry, normal, sensitive, & combination skin types.

Directions: Cleanse your face morning & night.  Apply to damp skin using upward circular motions with light pressure.  Rinse with warm water & follow with your favorite toner & moisturizer.

Ingredients: aloe barbadensis (organic aloe vera)|organic glycerin, vegetable derived|lavender flower distillate| coconut oil|jojoba oil| avocado oil| emulsifying wax| palm stearic acid|witch hazel|vitamin e

This listing is for one (1) 2.5oz or 4oz (based on specification) aluminum or glass bottle with pump.

name: : gift certificate :
description:
Shopping for someone special but not sure what to give them?  Give them the gift of super luxe body treatments with a WILD ROOTS herbal body care gift card.
Gift cards are delivered by email & contain instruction to redeem them at checkout.  If you'd prefer a paper copy delivered please notify us through our 'contact' page.

name: :HERBAL BODY BUTTER:
description:
My body butters heal, nourish & hydrate the skin.  

This butter is made with 100% natural unprocessed raw ingredients.  This super luxe body butter contains therapeutic levels of replenishing shea, cocoa, & avocado butters, famous for their regenerative properties.

This silky rich formula restores your skin's natural moisture level with oils like sunflower & coconut, known for their ever-loving healing properties.

Your skin will be left hydrated, soft, & silky smooth.  Suitable for all skin types!  Fresh & made to order.

:CHOOSE FROM:
Rosemary Lemongrass, Luscious Lavender, & Grapefruit Mint.

This listing is for one (1) 4oz. or one (1) 9oz. amber PET jar.  Depending on my stock it may be a clear PET jar.

Always use clean dry fingers, or better, use an applicator to scoop out butter.

:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:
" I got the rosemary lemongrass and aside for the fact that it is creamy and dreamy on my skin, the smell is so intoxicating I literally want to eat it, which I probably could since it is so natural!" -KATIE H.

name: :Eyes Like Holligold: calendula eye cream
description:
Hydrate your eyes.  Some say the eyes are windows to the soul, so treat them to this unique formula of soothing botanicals & flower hydrosols.

Eyes Like Holligold has a welcoming rich & creamy texture and is specially formulated to soak in & absorb quickly.  Lightweight & soothing. Extracts of Calendula will help to  constrict blood vessels & reduce under eye puffiness while reviving dry, puffy & sensitive under eye skin.

After cleansing face, apply a small amount of Eyes Like Holligold around the eyes, and mouth, do this nightly. You will see results after just a couple of uses.

Ingredients: calendula infused sesame oil, wheat germ oil, flower hydrosols, vegetable glycerin, beeswax, yeast extract, calendula extract, chamomile & lavender essential oil.

This listing is for one (1) 1.6 oz amber glass jar.

name: :BLEMISH REDUCER: on-the-spot acne treatment
description:
A medicinal blend of anti-bacterial essential oils to naturally get rid of toxins & reduce swelling caused by breakouts.

Blemish Reducer, a power packed combination of fruit oil & essential oils with proven anti-microbial & anti-bacterial properties to naturally treat pimples above & below the skin. This formula  contains Marula oil which is extremely rich in anti-oxidants.  It creates a protective hydrating barrier on the surface of the skin, heals skin tissue, and reduces redness. 

The more often you apply it, the faster blemishes heal.  Because this blend is so strong, it is important you only apply it to individual pimples to prevent dryness.  Use it as an emergency first-aid too, acting as a disinfectant.

Ingredients:clary sage, tea tree, lavender, lemongrass, clove bud, geranium, cedarwood, grapefruit, cypress, juniper, niaouli, Marula oil. 

This listing is for one (1) glass 7ml roll-on tube.

name: :HERBAL LIP BALM:
description:
Wild Roots herbal lip balm is an all natural formulation of calendula infused sunflower oil, organic shea butter, organic cocoa butter, vit e, coconut oil, & pure essential oils.  Cracked, dry lips will be softened & conditioned.

For a limited time try our PUMPKIN SPICE & for the winter holiday, CRANBERRY-LEMON & ROSEMARY.

:CHOOSE FROM:

cinnamint*best-seller, lavender-orange, spearmint, lemon-chamomile,unscented, sweet anise, pumpkin spice, cranberry-lemon&rosemary.

This listing is for one (1) .15oz lip balm

need more?
Purchase in 3 or 5 packs.
Please leave me a message in the comments section of your choosing.

:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:
"It is really nice to have a lip balm that actually makes my lips feel better instead of drying them out and having to reapply a  thousand times.  Eucalyptus cinnamon is my favorite but Lavender orange is a close second. " -KATIE H

name: :ACTIVE PHASE: LABOR & DELIVERY ESSENTIAL OIL BLEND
description:
Each of us has our own unique birthing journey, but all miraculous & beautiful.  For many women,  labor can be extremely uncomfortable.  Aromatherapy can be a powerful tool during the entire labor & delivery process, both physically and mentally.  We've combined quality essential oils known for their aromatic benefits--specifically women in labor to relax the body and bring the mind into balance.

Active Phase: Labor & Delivery Oil is to be used once labor has been established in order to help strengthen contractions & respiration, relieve anxiety, and help with relaxation. It can be used aromatically, or applied to the insides of your ankles, on feet, and around the tummy & lower back.  A great comfort tool for your Doula, labor coach, or partner to provide you with.

Ingredients: A smooth base of avocado oil that is healthy for your skin in an essential oil blend of oils that have been used for centuries to stimulate the uterus & help move along the labor process.  Upon purchase, your oil will have a complete listing of ingredients.

This listing is for one (1) .5 fl oz/15ml glass amber apothecary bottle with orifice reducer.

The statements in this listing have not been evaluated by the FDA.  This product is not intended to prevent, treat, or cure any disease. Please consult your physician for any ongoing medical conditions.

name: :GOLDEN AUTUMN:walnut & sugar polish
description:
We love this body polish.  Bonus, you get another opportunity to add to your fall favorites!  We captured all the magnificent scents of autumn in this super luxe body polish.

This unique formula is a base of ground walnut hulls and several different oils & sugars to help refresh and renew your entire body.  Gentle, consistent exfoliation is essential to aid in cell turnover, allowing your new and younger skin to show through.

Spice up your attitude with the crisp scents of cardamom, clove, bergamot, black pepper, & add a little sweetness of orange to your body this fall.

This listing is for one (1) size specified in a recyclable PET amber jar.

name: :SORE MUSCLE HEALING SALVE:
description:
If you work a physical job or have little ones at home this is a must for your medicine cabinet. This is a stimulating salve made for bumps, bruises, tired & sore muscles, and joint discomfort. You'll get that cool, tingling yet soothing sensation that you're looking for minus the petroleum & unwanted preservatives.

This salve utilizes a special blend of herbs & oils such as arnica, chamomile, and peppermint to quickly and deeply penetrate the skin and increase circulation while supporting the removal of toxins & internal bruising. Because peppermint oil has analgesic, anti-inflammatory and anti-spasmodic properties, it not only can relieve pain and inflammation but can also calm the spasms that cause muscle cramps.

Feel immediate relief.  A natural, menthol scent from herbs & oils.  Scent dissipates quickly.

This listing is for one (1) 2 oz. aluminum screw-top container.

name: :PUMPKIN FACIAL GLOW:
description:
Who doesn't love autumn?  We're bringing back our Pumpkin Facial Glow just for the fall season. Bring radiant life to your face & enjoy the intoxicating fragrance of this enzyme-rich cleanser that works as a gentle exfoliator & fights against premature aging, weathered skin, clogged pores, & dull, uneven skin tones.

Pumpkin is high in Vitamin A & C, and contains Zinc which helps to renew & even produce collagen. We packed this powerful treatment with pumpkin powder, oat flour, pumpkin seed oil, calendula & chamomile flowers, & rosemary extract.  A skin-healing, anti-oxidant treatment to leave your face feeling ultra soft & silky. Suitable  & gentle enough for all skin types.

Can be used as a daily cleanser or facial polish.  You can leave on as a mask for an extra-purifying treatment,  2-3 times per week. To use, massage into skin and then rinse. Follow with toner and moisturizer.

Available in 3 sizes this year!
1 oz, 2oz, or 4oz.
You will receive a detailed ingredient list on product.
This listing is for one (1) 1oz, 2oz, or 4oz. depending on specification.

What customers are saying:

"This face scrub is amazing.  As soon as I saw it on the website I knew I had to order it.  The first time I used it I fell in love.  It is so natural smelling and feels fantastic on my skin.  I have used it as a scrub and a mask and both leave my skin feeling refreshed."-Jamie

name: :HERBAL BABY MASSAGE OIL:
description:
Stimulate your baby's central nervous system with this organic baby oil.  Research has shown that infant massage is beneficial for both baby & parents.  In fact, studies have shown that massaging baby can reduce overall fussiness, promote a restful sleep, aid in digestion, and no doubt, improve skin conditions.

Made with 100% organic calendula & chamomile infused olive & avocado oils.  We then add a touch of lavender & sweet orange to calm & help baby sleep more peacefully.  This baby oil is rich in essential fatty acids, vitamins A, B, and D, and is rich in lecithin.

Create a daily massage routine.  This blend is a perfect, after bath time treat. To use, apply a few drops of Herbal Baby Oil directly to baby’s skin. Works best on either moist baby or with momma’s moist hands. Massage baby until oil has been well absorbed.

*Free of nut oils.

Ingredients: calendula & chamomile infused avocado oil|organic olive oil|lavender essential oil|sweet orange essential oil

This listing is for one (1) 4 oz. aluminum or glass, (depending on current stock) recyclable bottle with pump-style closure.

name: :URBAN COWBOY BEARD OIL:
description:
Soften up, protect that handsome beard of yours with nourishing oils & extracts that will absorb quickly into your hair and face, leaving no oily residue behind.

From our men's skin care line Urban Cowboy, comes our beloved Beard oil.  Formulated with several lightweight conditioning oils to promote a healthier, softer beard.  This formula packs quite a punch & tames even the wildest beards.

In a base of calendula & comfrey infused jojoba and sunflower oils, this blend is excellent for strengthening hair follicles and encouraging growth.  There's no doubt, it will leave you smelling fresh, herbal & slightly woodsy and looking 100% fine.

You only need a few drops to keep the beard soft & conditioned.  A perfect gift for the fellas' out there.

This listing is for one (1) handsomely packaged 2oz. glass bottle with screw cap top.

name: :URBAN COWBOY FACIAL OIL:
description:
Come on get handsome with our Urban Cowboy Men's Facial Oil.  Protect & hydrate your face with this intensive facial treatment made of organic, lightweight oils that absorb quickly into the skin.  A super luxe facial oil that forms a protective, soothing  barrier when applied to the skin, keeping dirt & grime out of your pores. It is nourishing but will not clog pores.

Our Men's Facial Oil is a powerful blend oils & extracts packed full of antioxidants, amino acids, essential fatty acids and many other skin loving nutrients.  Suitable for all types of man skin!  Particularly useful for unpredictable skin, overly dry, & skin inflammed with acne.  It will literally transform your skin after a few uses.

Apply this oil after cleansing for a healthier complexion. 

We can't get over this spicy-sweet, herbal fragrance!   Similar to our Urban Cowboy body polish, it has a fantastic woodsy/forest scent. You'll experience a little bit clove bud, vetiver, sage, need I say more? It's refreshing, stimulating, & uplifting.

Ingredients: organic herbs of comfrey & calendula infused in jojoba oil|rice bran oil|organic grapeseed oil|vitamin e|organic rosemary extract|proprietary blend of essential oils. 

This listing is for one (1) handsomely packaged 2oz. amber glass dropper bottle.

name: :URBAN COWBOY AFTERSHAVE TONIC:
description:
An aftershave from our men's skin care line, Urban Cowboy, to tighten your pores & soften your skin.  Formulated with White Willow Bark, Tulsi Hydrosol, Witch Hazel, and Aloe to create the astringent, tightening, & soothing affect you expect from an aftershave.

Old West meets Urban Cowboy in this warm & woodsy aftershave.  Top notes of mint, specifically spearmint & wintergreen, and middle notes of fresh juniper berry, and base notes of cedar & musk will leave you feeling uplifted & stimulated.  Especially good in fighting stress & fatigue.

A great cleansing tonic for oil & troublesome skin.  Will no doubt, leave you with a silky finish.  Alcohol, paraben & preservative free.

For application, give bottle a vigorous shake to blend the ingredients,  pour out a little bit into your palms, rub together and massage into face and neck. Enjoy the wow factor!

This listing is for one (1) handsomely packaged 2oz. or 4oz. amber glass bottle with screw-cap closure.

name: :THIEVES OIL:
description:
From the 15th century we bring to you our Thieves Oil.  This blend is believed to have originated in Europe by four thieves who covered themselves with cloves, rosemary, and other aromatics while robbing graves & the very ill. Using these precious oils protect them, they applied oil to their bodies and used the blend to clean the stolen items.  

This special blend of oil is centered around herbs that have been known for their antibacterial, antiviral, antiseptic, & anti-fungal properties for centuries.  The essential oils in the Thieves Oil blend are used to stimulate the immune system and protect you against any illness-from the flu to respiratory infections.  Our special Thieves Oil is enhanced with  dandelion infused jojoba oil and  blended with spicy, citrus, and floral antibacterial essential oils.

Use this oil topically at first inclination of illness. Massage a small amount on the bottom of your feet. Another great application would be to place 3-7 drops in a diffuser or in pot of water on the stove to purify the air.

With purchase you'll receive a detailed informational card on how to use.

Possible skin sensitivity. If pregnant or under a doctor's care, consult your physician. Always dilute before applying to the skin or taking internally. Keep out of reach of children.

This listing is for one (1) .33 fl oz/10 ml of oil in a handsome European dropper bottle.

What they're saying:
"I put a dab of this behind my ears or on my feet when I feel a cold coming on to prevent it...the other night I even had an upset stomach...applied some Thieves oil and it worked-amazing!"-Jamie

name: :HERBAL FOOT SOAK:
description:
:FANCY FEET SOAK:

Enliven tired, swollen, achy feet in a meditative salt soak.  I think feet are a beautiful part of the body, though most hide their feet I bet after a couple treatments with this soak you'll be comfortable enough to show them off!  So treat your feet right and you will find relief of your tired, rough, itchy, callused, abused & neglected feet.
Feel renewed after soaking your feet in nourishing & detoxifying salts of Dead Sea, Magnesium Chloride flakes, Himalayan Pink, fine grade Epsom Salt, Seaweed Powder, a powerful & effective cleansing & exfoliating agent, along with a soothing blend of herbs & flowers all to make your feet feel like heaven.  Extremely beneficial in warming cold feet!
For an extra-special treatment, after using this soak try using a pumice stone to buff away any rough areas & calluses.

This blend is beautifully packaged in an 8 oz. clear glass bottle with a screw-top lid.

This listing is for one (1) 8oz. bath soak.

name: :RESCUE: Restorative Facial Serum
description:
A vibrant, downright magical facial serum.

Serums work by depositing nutrients far deeper into your skin than a regular moisturizer may be able to reach and if used consistently will aid in prolonging the youthful qualities of your skin. This elixir nourishes on a cellular level which will result in restored, balanced, softened, repaired, & hydrated skin.

This oil blend provides super nourishment highlighting Marula, one of Africa’s most loved skin care oils -- extremely rich in anti-oxidants. It creates a protective hydrating coating on the surface of the skin, heals skin tissue, and reduces trans-epidermal water loss and redness, making skin smooth and resilient.  Other rare cold pressed plant oils of argan, rosehip seed are blended with pure essential oils of helichrysum & geranium to provide regenerative properties for sun damage, scarring, wrinkles, & other skin irritations.

A bright, lively scent.

ingredients: organic rosehip infused jojoba oil|Marula oil|Argan oil|helichrysum & geranium essential oils.

This listing is for one (1) 1 oz. amber glass bottle with a pump style closure.

What our customers are saying:
"This is one of my favorite Wild Roots products.  Since using this product to tone/refresh & finishing with the Restorative Facial Serum at night...I have not seen a blemish on my face.  I have very oily skin & surprisingly enough the facial serum leaves my face refreshed and not oils at all in the morning. Fantastic Products.

name: :Fun in the Sun SUNSCREEN:
description:
Fight free radicals caused by too much sun exposure!  While sunshine is important to allow for vitamin D absorption, too much sun exposure wreaks havoc on the skin.

Fun in the Sun provides you with an easy to apply, ideal sunscreen for the entire family.  In fact, it's great for babies & children.  You won't find any toxins in this formula, only healing & nourishing ingredients.

Fun in the Sun provides protection comparable to commercial SPF 20.

For best results, apply 20 minutes prior to sun exposure.  Reapply every 2 hours.  Makes a great after-sun soother too!

Ingredients: organic sesame oil, organic coconut oil, beeswax, non-nano zinc oxide, vitamin e, organic shea butter, & a proprietary blend of essential oils to help fight harmful UV rays.

Available in 2oz. roll-up tubes and 4oz. aluminum containers.  

This listing is for (1) 4 oz. aluminum container of sunscreen.

What they're saying:
"This sunscreen works fantastic.  With out all of the harsh chemicals in traditional sunscreen, this product gives you the results of avoiding a sunburn and feeling good about it!"

name: :HERBAL FACIAL OIL: Chamomile & Lemongrass
description:
The perfect solution for preserving a youthful skin tone!

This facial elixir is one serious moisturizer, containing a powerful blend of reparative oils like organic argan, chamomile infused almond oil, & rice bran oil, a natural anti-oxidant & rich in vitamin e--suitable for all skin types.

Like the rest of my facial oils, this formula will absorb quickly into your skin while allowing it to breathe.  This formulation features Argan oil, found exclusively in Morocco and contains high levels of essential fatty acids & vitamin e to repair and protect your complexion. 

An amazing anti-aging blend with an intoxicating scent of chamomile & lemongrass.  Chamomile essential oil is anti-inflammatory & is known to reduce puffiness.  Lemongrass works wonders on the nervous system, is great for headaches, exhaustion, & stress related situations.

Ingredients:organic chamomile infused almond oil|argan oil|rice bran oil|chamomile & lemongrass essential oils.

This listing is for one (1) 2 oz. amber glass bottle with a pump style closure.

name: :HERBAL FACIAL OIL: Palmarosa & Tea Tree
description:
This lightweight, non-greasy formula absorbs readily into the skin to heal breakouts and prevent future blackheads from forming.  A special anti-bacterial, anti-microbial blend to treat acne, nourish, tighten, & hydrate your skin.

With this oil's amazing healing properties, you'll notice a calmer, less stressed complexion.

Both Palmarosa & Tea Tree essential oil are especially valuable for treating all types of facial skin conditions. This facial oil was specifically designed to bring moisturize the skin, stimulate cellular regeneration, and regulate sebum production.

An uplifting, herbaceous scent worthy of using on your face morning & night after a gentle cleanse.

ingredients: organic calendula infused grapeseed oil|jojoba oil|tamanu oil|palmarosa essential oil|tea tree essential oil|lavender essential oil.

This listing is for one (1) 2oz. amber glass bottle with pump style closure.

name: :HERBAL FACIAL TREATMENTS:
description:
Clay is alive!  Clay has long been valued for its beautification & purification properties.  All clays have an amazing ability to deep clean the skin and depending on their ingredients, they can tone & tighten, hydrate, remove toxins, calm inflammations, increase circulation, exfoliate, & soften the skin.

All 3 of my facial masks have been carefully formulated so they can be used by everyone.  Some will benefit more than others depending on your skin type.  Regardless of your skin type, clay will gently exfoliate your skin as it tightens, stimulate circulation, soften your complexion & will certainly leave you with a healthy glow.

:CHOOSE FROM:

:MOROCCAN GLOW:
Pamper you skin with this RHASSOUL Clay facial treatment.  Rhassoul is a mineral rich clay that is found in the fertile Atlas Mountains of Morocco.  This mask is very high in mineral content: magnesium, silica, calcium, iron, potassium, & sodium make it a wonderful & effective balancing & cleansing mask.  This toning treatment has been shown to improve skin elasticity, remove dead skin cells, un-clog pores, & improve the overall clarity of your skin leaving you with a clean, glowing complexion.  In addition Bee Pollen, a superfood  known for its anti-aging, antioxidant, acne prevention & antibiotic properties has been added to this mix.

This is a perfect clay for weekly skin treatment.  Beneficial for all skin types, sensitive & mature skill will love this mask.

ingredients: Rhassoul Clay, Bee Pollen, Chamomile, Rose Petals, Lavender essential oil.

:GREEN GODDESS:
A deep, powerful treatment for problematic skin, oily or occasional use for normal skin.  French green clay is gentle and healing for sensitive skin.  This mask will aid in removing impurities & toxins from beneath the surface.  A stimulating treatment to clarify & bring balance to the skin.

ingredients: French Green Clay, organic seaweed powder, Matcha Green Tea, tea tree.

:HONEY FACE:
A perfect moisturizing mask for an even skin tone & renewing your complexion.  This is a great treatment to work on smoothing out fine lines & wrinkles.  Honey is high in vitamins B & C, and packed with amino acids which nourish the skin.  Honey works as a natural moisturizer, as well as reduces inflammation.  This mask is suitable for all skin types, & perfect for dry, sensitive skin.  It is mixed with Pumpkin powder, which contains high levels of A & C and will gently exfoliate and firm your skin.

ingredients: Kaolin Clay, Honey, Pumpkin Powder, Carrot & Helichrysum essential oils.

These masks come in powdered form.  This way, they'll keep nicely for you and you have the option to customize the mask based on your skins specific needs at any given time. 

 One teaspoon of powder is sufficient. It should be reconstituted with a liquid, such as water, though you can use whatever you have on hand & end up with fantastic results.  I use milk , witch hazel, yogurt, honey, tea, or floral waters.

Mix it in your palm into a spreadable paste, spread it onto face (and/or neck) avoiding eyes & leave on for 10-30 minutes. Rinse with warm water. 

This listing is for one (1) beautifully packaged net wt  2 oz. recyclable glass jar.

What they're saying:
" I mix this (Honey Face) all natural clay with plain yogurt...apply to my face and it immediately begins to work.  I use it about twice a week to remove dead skin cells and it leaves my face feeling impressively refreshed!"-J

name: :CALENDULA BABY BALM:
description:
Protect your little one's bottom from diaper rash!

This herbal baby balm is quickly absorbed, non-greasy & forms a protective barrier on the skin. We use this to protect our baby's delicate skin at diaper changing time. It will calm down any redness or irritation, help soreness & prevent diaper rash-works wonders on eczema flare-ups too. A multipurpose balm for the entire family! 

This balm is a gentle infusion of jojoba & organic olive oils with calendula, chickweed, & plantain. Then it is carefully warmed with organic shea butter, beeswax, with gentle antiseptic, antibacterial, & anti-inflammatory essential oils of lavender, chamomile & a touch of tea tree.

Calendula nourishes & softens dry chapped skin but is most recognized for its effectiveness in healing skin problems, from insect bites to eczema.  It is well known to have antiseptic, anti fungal, & anti bacterial properties.

name: :Aromatherapy Mist:
description:
Aromatherapy sprays are sure to stimulate your mind, body, & spirit.  Change your mood easily & naturally! It is a well-known fact that if you use essential oils as aromatherapy it can affect your mood in a positive way.  So, inhale and be taken away to your happy place.

Infused with essential oils to make the perfect blend, these sprays are gentle enough to use on your body or face.


:Choose from:

:Morning Mist:
m i n t y. f r e s h. u p l i f t i n g.
Awaken your soul with the enticing scents of rosemary, eucalyptus, peppermint, sweet orange, & lavender.  Welcome your day with an aromatherapy aid that will invoke a fresh breath of the outdoors.

This aromatherapy mist is beneficial to any skin condition.  It helps ease burns, itching, & bug bites.  It is also invigorating to the senses with a fresh, clean aroma.  The vitamin rich base of avocado oil & aloe is deeply moisturizing & a miraculous skin protector.

:Sleepytime Aromatherapy Mist:
s o o t h e s. c a l m s. r e l a x e s.
With a combination of relaxing, calming, & peaceful  essential oils this aromatherapy mist is perfect for when life's little problems wear you down.

Sleepytime Mist is an extremely good linen mist as it calms the mind & eases you into a relaxed sleep. Mist your sheets & pillows before climbing into bed to combat insomnia & to induce a good nights sleep.
Contains pure essential oils of organic lavender, organic sweet orange, organic blue chamomile, petitgrain,& cedarwood.

These mists can be used as a linen spray, air freshener, light perfume body mist, or a refreshing mist.

Ingredients: distilled water, organic floral waters, essential oils & absolutes.

:No Nausea Mist:
A combination of therapeutic essential oils to give you relief from feelings of nausea.  

This mist smells heavenly.  Each of its essential oils was chosen for its unique ability to quell nausea symptoms associated with growing a little human.  A blend of organic oils & essential oils to relax and refresh.

Ingredients: distilled water, organic hydrosols, essential oils of peppermint, ginger, cardamon, lavender, lemon, & grapefruit.  


This listing is for one (1) 4oz. recyclable aluminum bottle with spray mister.

What customers are saying:
"My husband loves this stuff!!! As a shirt worker...his sleep schedule is all mixed up.  Sleepy time mist has helped him relax before his sleep begins.  Just a few sprays of this and a great nights sleep is ahead.  Truly relaxing."

name: :Eczema Relief:
description:
Problematic skin? Eczema? Psoriasis? Sunburn? Dry, itchy Skin? 

There are so many wonderful uses for this product.
This rescue balm will rapidly heal problem areas, reduce inflammation and irritation in eczema flare-ups.  

I've kept this balm very simple using all natural, organic ingredients of calendula infused jojoba oil, organic olive oil, beeswax, Rare Earth Farm raw honey, & propolis tincture.

Apply to problem areas multiple times daily & watch problem areas heal.

This listing is for one (1) 2 oz. roll-up tube.  What to try a sample?  Try the .15 oz. chap-stick size.

name: :A Face Like Holligold:
description:
:CALENDULA FACIAL OIL:
I know, putting oil on your face, especially with oily or acne prone skin might sound crazy.  Believe me, it's not!  This oil & all of its ingredients are well known for their antiseptic & antibacterial qualities.  This facial oil will balance the skins natural sebum alleviating all sorts of common problems like dryness, acne, eczema, & redness.  Use this facial oil to stimulate new cell growth & improve circulation.

 A Face Like Holligold is suitable for all skin types & fantastic for preserving a youthful skin tone & texture.

ingredients: solar infused calendula, chamomile, rosehip seed, & marshmallow root in grapeseed oil, jojoba oil, rosehip seed oil, vitamin e, & essential oils of carrot seed, lavender, & rose absolute.

This listing is for one (1) 2oz. glass dropper bottle.

:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:
I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!  My skin has changed so much as I've gotten older and this oil makes me look 25 again.  My acne has reduced, my redness is calmed and no more dry patches.  I actually got a facial recently and the esthetician asked me what I was using because I had such great skin!-KATIE

name: :HERBAL LIP TINT:
description:
A blushing balm for sassy lips!  This herbal lip tint is naturally colored with alkanet root & hibiscus flower.  This balm is made with calendula infused sunflower oil, coconut oil, shea, cocoa, & mango butters providing lasting moisture.  You'll love the soft scent of rose too. 

Kiss Me Now! Lip Tint  provides a touch of color perfect for everyday use.  The tint can be used on cheeks as well!

This listing is for one (1) lip tint in a .50oz metal tin.

:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:
"  I love color on my lips but I don't love the heaviness of lipstick.  Behold a perfect collaboration.  Smells like roses, glides on easy, feels and moisturizes like lip balm and gives me a perfectly bright berry colored pout. What more could a girl ask for!"

name: :SOLID PERFUME:
description:
Solid perfume is the ultimate convenience, just throw it in your purse & go. 

Made from skin nourishing ingredients of beeswax, coconut oil, shea butter, & sunflower oil, this moisturizing  formula will nourish your skin as it holds your scent close to you, gently warming on your skin.  The beautiful thing about essential oils, they gently meld with your body chemistry, becoming a gorgeous fragrance all your own.

:CHOOSE FROM THE FOLLOWING SCENTS:

:HIPPIE LOVE:
A scent for free spirits & open minds.  This is a perfect blend of lavender, patchouli, lemongrass, cedarwood, sweet orange, & clary sage.  A bold, herbaceous combination of earth & sunshine.
best seller.

:Oh MY Clementine!
A scent for fresh minds & wild hearts.  The sweet smell of clementine blossoms & fresh ripe citrus provide a fresh & exhilarating aroma with a touch of spice.  A clean herbal fragrance with slight honey-spice notes.

:Petal Pusher:
For the flower child at heart.  This sensual blend has an uplifting & restorative effect on the mind, body, and soul.  Essences of ylang ylang, rose absolute, lavender, & topped with rosemary & grapefruit.

Just apply to pulse points a few times a day.

Please Note:
This solid perfume will melt if exposed to hot temperatures. This will not damage the product. Simply place in the refrigerator or cool area of your house to harden.

This listing is for one (1) .50oz recyclable metal tin or one (1) .15 twist tube.

Caution: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. If pregnant, nursing, taking medication, or have a medical condition, consult a healthcare practitioner prior to use.

name: :HERBAL BODY OILS:
description:
These precious body oils are light & absorb readily into the skin while their velvety texture will condition & soften the skin. Use these oil blends in a bath or directly on the skin.

I infuse my own oils.  It is a lengthy but extremely rewarding process that relies on patience & sunshine.

CHOOSE FROM:

:RESTORING & REVIVING:
A rejuvenating blend of herbs & oils to uplift tiresome skin. 
Avocado, grapeseed & olive oils infused with calendula flowers, comfrey root, rosemary leaves, & lavender flowers blended with pure essential oils of lavender, eucalyptus, sweet orange, grapefruit, rosemary, vetiver, vit e & a touch of peppermint.

:SUPER SOOTHING:
A gentle blend of herbs & oils to soothe irritated, itchy skin.  Avocado, jojoba & olive oils infused with flowers of calendula, chamomile, rose, & lavender blended with pure essential oils of chamomile, lavender & patchouli.

:PREGNANCY PICK-ME-UP:
A nourishing blend of herbs & oils to alleviate a plethora of pregnancy problems from stretch marks to exhaustion!
Avocado, grapeseed, rose hip, & olive oils infused with flowers of chamomile, lavender & rose blended with pure essential oils of lemon, geranium, ylang ylang, lavender, & sweet orange.

:BOTANICAL BALANCE:
A blend of therapeutic herbs, organic oils & essential oils prized for the treatment of damaged and weathered skin, scar tissue, stretch marks, wrinkles, eczema, & burns.  Packed with organic herbs of marshmallow root, calendula, & chamomile to heal skin irritations, reduce inflammation, & protect the skin.

With its helichrysum, grapefruit, sandalwood, juniper, & lavender essential oils, it's one of the most intriguing fragrances ever! 

Helichrysum is a precious & powerful antibacterial & anti-inflammatory essential oil.  The rosehip seed, sunflower & avocado oil base are all rich in vitamins A, D & E, as well as essential fatty acids leaving your body hydrated, soft, & renewed.

:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:
"Super Soothing Body Oil:  When the winter winds are harsh, this body oil keeps my skin hydrated.  It makes my skin silky and luxurious. I'm quite sensitive to perfumes and smells, but this oil is perfectly scented and gentle. I love to use it right out of the shower or before bed."-KEH.

name: :FACIAL TONER: Not Your Grandma's
description:
A delightful facial toner that balances the skin's natural pH, reduces skin irritations, and tightens & tones.  Not Your Grandma's Facial Toner soothes & invigorates while helping to improve circulation.  Literally drenches your skin with pure nutrients! 
 
Made with distilled spirits infused with rose petals, lavender floral water, witch hazel, aloe vera leaf juice blended with pure essential oils.  It's fantastic for soothing skin that's been harmed by UV exposure over the years.

Use as a regular toner or whenever your skin feels dry or needs an herbal boost.

This listing is for one (1) 2oz. or one (1) 4 oz. bottle with a screw top lid.

:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:
"I was gifted a bottle of "Not your Grandma's facial toner", and my face was so happy!  I felt refreshed and young, and my co-workers told me my skin was glowing :)"  - Sandra

"This is one of my favorite Wild Roots products.  Since using this product to tone/refresh and finishing with the Restorative Facial Serum at night...I have not seen a blemish on my face.  I have very oily skin and suprisingly  the facial serum leaves my face refreshed and not oily at all in the morning.  Fantastic Products.-Jamie

name: :HERBAL SALVES:
description:
CHOOSE FROM:

:HERBAL SKIN HEALING SALVE:
Carefully formulated with the skin loving & healing herbs of comfrey, chamomile, lavender, & extracts of arnica & St. John's wort infused in organic olive, grapeseed, & avocado oils.  Blended with beeswax, shea butter, coconut oil, & vitamin e.
This is a wonderfully soothing balm.  The essential oils are pleasant & herbaceous with citrus undertones.  Great for over-worked chapped farm hands!

:CALENDULA BABY BALM:
USE THIS TO PROTECT YOUR LITTLE ONE'S BOTTOM FROM DIAPER RASH.
This herbal baby balm is quickly absorbed, non-greasy & forms a protective barrier on the skin. We use this to protect our baby's delicate skin at diaper changing time. It will calm down any redness or irritation, help soreness & prevent diaper rash.

This balm is a gentle infusion of jojoba & organic olive oils with calendula, chickweed, & plantain. Then it is carefully warmed with organic shea butter, beeswax, with gentle antiseptic, antibacterial, & anti-inflammatory essential oils of lavender, chamomile & a touch of tea tree.

Calendula nourishes & softens dry chapped skin but is most recognized for its effectiveness in healing skin problems, from insect bites to eczema.  It is well known to have antiseptic, anti fungal, & anti bacterial properties. 

:HERBAL CHEST RUB:
Take care of your body with this organic, all-natural chest rub.
This rub is a wonderful alternative to the conventional vapor rub!  Created with eucalyptus, camphor, peppermint, wintergreen, & lavender in a base of coconut oil & beeswax.  This lovely balm is gentle enough to help clear chest & sinus congestion.  It also helps to increase circulation & reduce flu-like body aches.  
Apply as needed to chest area & breathe in the aromatic vapors.  This feels great applied to the soles of your feet as well, & underneath the toes.

:FANCY FEET:
A reparative healing salve to relieve tired aching feet, cracked dry skin, and heal wounds & infections.  This special formulation of herbs, oils, & essences helps to relieve aches & pains and promotes a rejuvenating effect for tired, sore feet.  Contains a unique blend of essential oils known for their antibacterial, antifungal, anti-inflammatory, & circulation-promoting properties.
 
ingredients: rosemary infused sunflower oil, coconut oil, arnica extract, organic cocoa butter,Beeswax, vit e, essential oils of lavender, peppermint, lemongrass, & tea tree.

:TATTOO PROTECTIVE SALVE:
An alternative to petroleum-based ointments & lotions.  Use this healing salve as an aftercare to heal new tattoos fast.  Made with skin-loving ingredients of rosemary infused sunflower oil, avocado oil infused with nourishing herbs of calendula, chamomile, & plantain, organic shea butter, beeswax, & vit e.  Sweet & spicy aroma of sweet orange, clove bud, cardamom, & patchouli.

Apply a thin layer of Tattoo Protective Salve (after gently washing your new tattoo) over the entire area until salve is no longer visible.  You may repeat 3-4 times a day or as needed to keep the skin moist.


:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:
"My left index finger had an unfortunate kitchen incident five days ago...skipped stitches...the herbal healing salve is doing wonders for it! Thank you!"
-Debra Jo of RARE EARTH FARM, Belgium, Wi. 

"I was delighted to discover that the Calendula Baby Balm is not just for babies!  It saved the day (and my ladybusiness) when I was trying to cope with the uncomfortable itching of a yeast infection.  It was gentle and soothing, and I have told all my girlfriends about it.  THANK YOU WILD ROOTS." -River

name: :HERBAL BATH SOAKS:
description:
I have a love affair with bath salts.  A meditative sea salt bath is one of the most effective ways to calm anxiety, treat lethargy & depression, & bring about mental clarity. Many have found this soak to be elegant, warm, comforting, & refreshing all at the same time. Plus, all of my formulations have blissful, intoxicating fragrances!

:CHOOSE FROM:

:BOTANICAL BALANCE:
In a base of mineral-rich Pink Himalayan & Hawaiian Red Salts this invigorating blend was formulated with properties to help people going through transformation, be it a new job, a new baby, or entering in a new relationship. This Botanical Balance blend will leave your body soft & silky.
ingredients: Pink Himalayan, Hawaiian Red, Dead Sea, & Epsom salts, flowers of calendula, lavender, rose, & chamomile.  Essential oils of lemongrass, lavender, cedarwood, eucalyptus, and sweet orange.

:GET WELL BLEND:
Ease the aches & pains that come along with the cold/flu.  This nourishing & detoxifying soak is made with Himalayan , Black Lava, Epsom, & Dead Sea salts blended with essential oils of rosemary, tea tree, eucalyptus, lavender, & a touch of peppermint to help clear the nasal passages.  These essential oils also have natural anti-bacterial, anti-viral, & anti-fungal properties.  You'll love the rejuvenating scent too!  This soak can be used as a detoxifying medium.

:FANCY FEET SOAK:
Enliven tired, swollen, achy feet in a meditative salt soak.  I think feet are a beautiful part of the body, though most hide their feet I bet after a couple treatments with this soak you'll be comfortable enough to show them off!  So treat your feet right and you will find relief of your tired, rough, itchy, callused, abused & neglected feet.
Feel renewed after soaking your feet in nourishing & detoxifying salts of Dead Sea, Himalayan Pink, fine grade Epsom Salt, Seaweed Powder, a powerful & effective cleansing & exfoliating agent, along with a soothing blend of herbs & flowers all to make your feet feel like heaven.  Extremely beneficial in warming cold feet!
For an extra-special treatment, after using this soak try using a pumice stone to buff away any rough areas & calluses.

Both blends are beautifully packaged in an 8 oz. clear glass bottle with a screw-top lid.

This listing is for one (1) 8oz. bath soak.

:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:
"Obviously this is a great product for the bath tub, but I love to use this in a foot bath.  After a long day on my feet they bath tea literally puts life back into my barking dogs. Works wonders on my dry cracked heels too!"

name: Baby bee bath soak
description:
Take care of your little one with this soothing, all-natural oat milk bath.  Specially formulated with a therapeutic blend of calming herbs to moisturize and soothe baby's delicate skin.

This soak is handy to have around for all seasons, winter  to relieve terribly dry, itchy, sensitive skin & summer for bug bites, sunburns, poison ivy, poison oak, poison sumac & other itching & scratching rashes, even chicken pox!

Just fill the muslin bag provided & hang over your bath faucet, allowing warm water to run over the bag as the tub fills. As flowers steep & powdered ingredients dissolve, a light & creamy bath 'tea' is produced. Once the tub is filled, use the bag & its remaining contents as a gentle exfoliator - undissolved oats & flowers leave skin silky smooth.

Feel free to skip the muslin bag.  Just shake a small amount of bath mix into baby's running water.  Swish it around until it dissolves.

Ingredients:organic oatmeal, organic powdered milk, organic powdered buttermilk, organic powdered coconut milk, baking soda, lavender, chamomile, calendula & rose flowers, & pure essential oils of lavender & Moroccan blue chamomile.

This listing is for one (1) 8 ounce recyclable glass jar.

handmade in Duluth, Minnesota.

name: :HERBAL HAIR TONIC:
description:
Remove buildup & residue and soften your locks with this restorative conditioning spray.  Cider vinegar rinses have been around for centuries.  This hair tonic will restore you hair's natural shine & bring vitality to your locks.
This simple rinse, is made from an apple cider vinegar rosemary infusion.   Vinegar, the key ingredient in this tonic removes product buildup and sebum on the hair shaft.  It helps to balance the pH of the hair and improves its ability to retain moisture.

Rosemary is an excellent hair tonic & improves circulation bringing nutrients & oxygen to the scalp.  Rosemary stimulates hair growth.

Ingredients:apple cider vinegar, organic rosemary leaf, distilled water, aloe vera, essential oils of rosemary, lemongrass & peppermint.

:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:
"The herbal hair rinse I just received is AMAZING! recommended for everyone! Used 2 days ago and am so impressed. Hair is more manageable, looks healthy, and most of all does not have that "weighed down" feeling. I have fine hair that does not curl, yesterday I was able to put a few curls in without any product and it stayed all day ~even got a hair compliment!
Kudos to the craftsmanship of your products! The quality of your product far exceeds the (100's) of hair products I have tried before! And they are so affordable! Thanks WILDROOTS!! "-JR

name: :HERBAL INSECT REPELLENT:
description:
A safe & effective alternative to DEET & other chemical based bug repellents.  Wild Roots Insect Oil is formulated with essential oils that are proven to naturally repel pests all while smelling wonderful to humans.  Many have requested this product based on the scent alone!  This formula will also calm inflammation & ease the discomfort of any existing bites.

Spray on skin & clothes as needed to deter mosquitoes, gnats, ticks & other unruly bugs.

Shake well before use. 

 Ingredients: soybean oil, distilled water, witch hazel, vegetable glycerin, & an original blend of pure essential oils. 

This listing is for one (1) 2.5 oz. or 4 oz. recyclable aluminum bottle. 

What our customers are saying:
"I LOVE this spray...and I feel good about using it on my kids.  Not only does it smell fantastic...I feel good using it on myself and them.  Finally a bug spray product without all the harsh chemicals!!!!!"-JT

name: :No.Nausea Mist:
description:
A combination of therapeutic essential oils to give you relief from feelings of nausea.  

This mist smells heavenly.  Each of its essential oils was chosen for its unique ability to quell nausea symptoms associated with growing a little human.  A blend of organic oils & essential oils to relax and refresh.

Ingredients: distilled water, organic hydrosols, essential oils of peppermint, ginger, cardamon, lavender, lemon, grapefruit, & spearmint.
 
This listing is for one (1) 4oz. recyclable aluminum spray bottle.

name: POSTPARTUM BATH TEA
description:
A blend of soothing & calming herbs traditionally used for their regenerating & antiseptic properties to relax & heal sore bottoms after labor & delivery.

Use these herbs in a sitz bath or as a compress for soothing relief from postpartum swelling & soreness, episiotomies & tears, hemorrhoids,  & perineal bruising.  Use the tea prepartaion in a peri-bottle to reduce swelling in the perineal area.  For immediate relief, freeze the compress before applying to your bottom.

Please specify if you'd like healing salts added to your postpartum herbs.  Epsom salts are one of the most effective & most commonly used treatments for wounds around the world. In addition, sea salt is antiseptic, promotes healing & is soothing to open tissues.

I use only the highest quality organic and wildcrafted herbs, carefully chosen for their traditional healing properties.
 
This listing is for one (1) 4oz. recyclable glass jar.

Calendula,  chamomile, & marshmallow root are infused in jojoba & grapeseed oils with gentle, reparative essential oils of lavender & chamomile.  This salve will help to soothe inflammation & aid in skin regeneration.

Safe for baby too-no need to wash it off before nursing.

Ingredients:organic jojoba & avocado oils infused with organic calendula, chamomile, & marshmallow root, organic shea butter, coconut oil, & beeswax, chamomile essential oil.

description:

Rid the chance of stretch marks, keep your belly moisturized!  This oil will help condition your growing belly bump relieving you of that itchy skin feeling.

Organic sunflower & olive oils infused with flowers of chamomile, calendula, rose hips, & lavender blended with pure essential oils of geranium, lavender, ylang ylang, rose, sweet orange, & vit e.

name: :BIRTHING BELLY BAR:
description:
Pamper your growing belly with this luscious, moisturizing lotion bar.  Lotion bars are like traditional lotion, only better. The beeswax forms a protective, breathable barrier to seal in moisture so the effects last longer. Easy to transport and wonderful for dry skin. Since they contain no water, they have a long shelf life without the need for preservatives.

Made from calendula infused jojoba & avocado oils, coconut oil, beeswax, organic cocoa butter, organic shea butter, organic mango butter, vit e, & pure essential oils of lavender, chamomile, ylang ylang, geranium, & sweet orange.

Directions: Rub the bar in your hands to soften, then massage onto your growing baby bump.

This listing is for one (1) net wt 2.75 oz. Birthing Belly Bar packaged in a reusable 4 oz. metal tin.

name: :LAVENDER.LEMON: body polish
description:
We can't get enough of fresh lemon & lavender in the summertime. This sweet, gentle sugar body polish will nourish your skin, leaving you moisturized & renewed, while the essential oil blend will provide an aromatherapy experience for summertime senses.

This body polish is a base of organic, fair trade sugars naturally rich in vitamins & minerals to gently buff away dead skin and impurities.  Carefully blended with skin-loving oils of sesame & avocado to provide deeply penetrating hydration & healing, along with vitamin a & e, and antioxidants. A generous amount of our own lavender flowers are mixed in this scrub to enhance the beauty, bringing it all together.

This listing is for either one (1) 4oz. or one (1) 8 oz. recyclable PET jar.

name: :OLD THYME COFFEE: BODY POLISH
description:
If you're looking for an intense moisturizing experience, this is it! A revitalizing & refreshing scrub with locally roasted coffee & mixed with raw turbinado sugar, organic rose thyme, & organic mint in a base of avocado & grapeseed oils with pure essentials of cypress, juniper, sweet orange, marjoram, & vetiver.  

This powerfully exfoliating polish not only removes dead skin cells, leaving the skin healthier, but nourishes & softens you instantly.  Caffeine is known to tighten pores & reduce the appearance of varicose veins & cellulite by increasing blood flow to the skin's surface.

This listing is for one (1) 4oz. or 8oz. depending on specification recyclable jar.

What they're saying:
"This is hands down my favorite product in the Wild Roots line.  This product leaves my skin feeling amazing. I use it exfoliate my face, hands and even my feet!  The oils in this product make my skin feel so smooth.  This product is amazing."_JT

name: :URBAN COWBOY: BODY POLISH
description:
Feel closer to the earth with this organic salt scrub.  This woodsy body polish is made with fresh essential oils of Texas cedarwood, bergamot, sweet orange, balsam fir, juniper berry, lemon, & patchouli blended with vitamin e, rosemary & black tea leaves.

Soothes & rejuvenates the body & mind.
Supports respiratory function.
Creates an uplifting sense of well-being.
Relief of sore muscles, aches & pains.

This listing is for one (1) 4oz. or one 8oz. PET clear jar.

name: :DEEP DETOX: BODY POLISH
description:
A minty revolution!

Organic salt scrub that will gently cleanse the impurities right out of you! 
 This body scrub is made with essential oils of eucalyptus, lavender, peppermint, rosemary, wintergreen, & tea tree blended with vitamin e and herbs of lavender & rosemary.

This listing is for one (1) 4oz. or one (1) 8oz. PET clear jar.

description:
A romantic favorite!

Organic sugar scrub with sweet essentials oils of ylang ylang, geranium, lavender, sweet orange all blended with star anise, calendula and vitamin e.

Calms & brings about a sense of relaxation.
Helps to relieve feelings of anger, tension, &
nervous irritability.

:WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING:

This listing is for one (1) 4oz. or one (1) 8oz. PET amber jar.
